Activity: Conduct end-of-week review of engagement metrics and outreach efforts.
Final meeting with all team members to discuss outreach strategy and next steps.
Summarize team inputs and finalize adjustments to the communication strategy.
Prepare summary report of the week's achievements and lessons learned.

Conduct personal reflection and relax to recharge for the following week.
